snippet: Richard Gasquet of France beat Sam Querrey, 6-2, 7-6 (8), and Denis Istomin of Uzbekistan beat John Isner, 5-7, 7-6 (5), 6-3.
abstract: Only two American men in field at Rome Masters tennis tournament are eliminated in opening round, with Richard Gasquet of France beating Sam Querrey, and Denis Istomin of Uzbekistan beating John Isner,
lead_paragraph: Richard Gasquet of France beat Sam Querrey, 6-2, 7-6 (8), and Denis Istomin of Uzbekistan beat John Isner, 5-7, 7-6 (5), 6-3.

headline.main: Americans Knocked Out at Rome Masters
